If you suffer from clinical obsessive compulsive order, don't play this game.

Cheaters are rampant in casual Dust II, the other casual maps less so. 

Don't cheat, or be a douche bag, avoid getting reported.. Keep trust factor high so you don't see cheaters in competitive. If your trust factor drops, your comp matches will be ruined.
old game bad movement, toxic players, filled with hackers.

Broke game. After completeting a game of a wingman even saw the resoult and game was finished. i exited the game got back to start and i still had the game like if i left it. then i klick on abandom game and i get a 30 minut cooldown from the a game that was already done playing. Great game you got here. broken shit game that
não roda nem com o capeta ESSA MALDIÇÃO DE JOGO
The best game if you want cancer, but enjoy it at the same time.

Biggest problem: Toxic. Super super toxic. Slurs thrown out like candy in 4 out of my last 5 online games. A little surprising that valve hasn't managed to get that under control.

Other than that, its CS:S with slightly better graphics, less choice in maps, you have to pay for skins rather than getting them from the workshop/fpsbanana, with no real game improvements. It's fun, other than the toxicity, see above, but they really need to add more of a variety to Arms Race and Demolition playlists.
very noice valve! pls make csgo2 x)
Servers go down for hours at a time with no warning. Do not buy this game.
